summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of TVs with features such as 4K resolution, Dolby Vision, HDR 10+, and built-in voice assistants. Prices range from $299 and up. Accessories like wall mounts and soundbars are also available to enhance the viewing experience. All TVs come with a 1-year limited warranty. There is also currently a promotion for a 20% discount on TVs when purchased together with a Contoso Wireless subscription plan.
